languages.text: "Дом Грантис никогда не внушал уважения или доверия. Не сомневаюсь, это они притащили в поместье слуг-предателей!"

traits.locale_text: "Семья Грантис никогда не внушала уважения. Уверена, это они притащили в поместье слуг-предателей!"

languages.text: "House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"
languages.original_text: "Дом Грантис никогда не внушал уважения или доверия. Не сомневаюсь, это они притащили в поместье слуг-предателей!"

traits.locale_text: "House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"
"House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"
"House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"
"House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"

languages.text: “格兰蒂斯家族从来没有赢得过任何人的尊敬或信任。我敢打包票，肯定是他们把那群背信弃义的仆人带进了庄园！”
languages.original_text: "House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"

traits.locale_text: “格兰蒂斯家族从来没有赢得过任何人的尊敬或信任。我敢打包票，肯定是他们把那群背信弃义的仆人带进了庄园！”

languages.text: «La casa Grantis nunca ha inspirado ni respeto ni confianza. ¡No me cabe duda de que fueron ellos quienes trajeron a los sirvientes traidores a la mansión!».
languages.original_text: "House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"

traits.locale_text: «La casa Grantis nunca ha inspirado ni respeto ni confianza. ¡No me cabe duda de que fueron ellos quienes trajeron a los sirvientes traidores a la mansión!».

languages.text: 「グランティス家は尊敬されたこともなければ信用されたこともない。怪しい従者をこの土地に招いたのは奴らで間違いない！」
languages.original_text: "House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"

traits.locale_text: 「グランティス家は尊敬されたこともなければ信用されたこともない。怪しい従者をこの土地に招いたのは奴らで間違いない！」

languages.text: "Das Haus Grantis hat niemals Respekt oder Vertrauen erworben. Ich hege keinen Zweifel, dass sie die verräterischen Diener auf das Anwesen gebracht haben!"
languages.original_text: "House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"

traits.locale_text: "Das Haus Grantis hat niemals Respekt oder Vertrauen erworben. Ich hege keinen Zweifel, dass sie die verräterischen Diener auf das Anwesen gebracht haben!"

languages.text: « La maison Grantis n'a jamais inspiré ni le respect ni la confiance. Les traîtres se trouvent parmi leurs serviteurs, j'en mettrais ma main au feu ! »
languages.original_text: "House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"

traits.locale_text: « La maison Grantis n'a jamais inspiré ni le respect ni la confiance. Les traîtres se trouvent parmi leurs serviteurs, j'en mettrais ma main au feu ! »

languages.text: "Grantis Hanesi hiçbir zaman saygınlığıyla veya güvenilirliğiyle tanınmamıştır. Bu kalleş hizmetkârları da konağa onların getirdiğine şüphe yok!"
languages.original_text: "House Grantis has never inspired respect or trust. I have no doubt that it was they who brought the treacherous servants into the estate!"

traits.locale_text: "Grantis Hanesi hiçbir zaman saygınlığıyla veya güvenilirliğiyle tanınmamıştır. Bu kalleş hizmetkârları da konağa onların getirdiğine şüphe yok!"
